Articles.Content:
First off i apologize if i thread is already open on this issue. had a look and couldn't find one on the issue.

Ive been playing KSP for 3 days without any issues, today from the start the sound is popping/crackling?.

Ive tried uninstalling and still i get the popping noise.

Is there any way to fix this issue?

Thanks

Hi HEATHG, there is a bug in the Unity game engine that causes this and there's no way to fix that, but it doesn't mean there isn't something else contributing to the problem.

Please see this thread, and provide your game logs.
